snippet.title: Painkiller Purgatory - Gameplay - Trailer
snippet.description:
Painkiller Purgatory by Chillingo Ltd

Painkiller Purgatory is the most intense, gripping, 3D action shooter available on your iPhone!

Fight your way through Purgatory and battle in the underworld to stop the imminent unholy war.

HIGH OCTANE WEAPONS

Vanquish your foes with an arsenal of deadly weaponry, from visceral spinning blades to a devastating Gatling gun.

TRADEMARK GIANT BOSS BATTLES

Huge bosses will use all of Hell's power to steal your soul. Destroy them or stay in Purgatory forever.

DARK, GRIPPING ATMOSPHERE

Trapped in a dark and terrifying world, awaiting purification for your earthly sins, you must fight through your worst nightmare and finally overthrow Lucifer!

UNLOCK ACHIEVEMENTS WITH CRYSTAL

Complete challenges, unlock achievements and post your high score around the world using the integrated Crystal social platform.

iTunes Store Link:

http://itunes.apple.com/us/app/painkiller-purgatory/id417359854?mt=8#

Homepage:

http://www.chillingo.com/sku.htm?sid=80117
